author: Simon Difford
description: Fruity and refreshing – a party drink with rum and raspberry flavours predominating. At its best when made with homemade raspberry syrup.
name: Knickerbocker
recipeIngredient: 75 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first all ingredients with ice and strain into glass 2/3rd filled with cubed ice
Cap with crushed ice, serve with a straw
